Descriptions.description: Homeopathy: An anwser to many things, but not the right one.
LinkedOut: Everything is plain and blank and you want to offer shitty jobs to your aquaintances.
Dolicetamol: Might cure fever. Might.
Dolicetamal: Cause fever.
Steroïds: A heartbreaking breakthrough in sport's world
Barathenol: Strengthen your muscle, but you might feel drunk for a bit.
Rednex: You suddenly feel a urge to swear.
Salty: Acids, without the trip.
Canabinoïds: See the world in pink. Your heart feel warmer.
Backenitriol: Your brain knows more about the world. Especially its bitterness.
Morning breath: You really should not blow with this thing.
Android: An apple a day keeps doctor away. Not this one particularly.
Head Bang: Good for your back and neck muscle. Badly increases blood pressure in the brain.
Peregrin Tookit: You feel as kind and light-hearted as a hobbit. Too bad it's Pippin.
Meditation medication: Breathe in, breathe out. You can't eat meat anymore though.
Cross Feet: You will walk on water. Caution, might change it into wine.
Central Perk: Some fresh air from a central park morning jog. New, central park drugs now included.
Athmatix: You are now better at not breathing.
Saturnine: Makes you start thinking about the world and accepting how small you are in it. Develope your intestinal fauna.
Sleepingbeautic: A good 24h nap.
Your-X: The same effect as learning you've been cheated on. Now with improved relief due to the termination of a shitty relationship.
Clear Weather: No more dark thoughts, no more headache
Prank Heinstein: It's funny but not super clever.
Britanny: We concentrated a lot of butter in this tiny pill.
Snailax: Leafs are now extra good for your health. The cost? Mucus.
Merry Pops In: Just a spoonfull of sugars makes the medecine goes down.
Elfant Tusk: Takes this to Mars for me would you?
Berti Botts: Why is there smoke escaping the pill ?
Marathonium: Run boy run, this world is not made for you
Gandhill: The curry nukes your intestine, but peacefully.
Gasoline: Three, two, one, run. Now. Toilets are on the left.
Konrad Lorenz: Strengthen most of your muscle, but ducks are now attracted to you.
Old Lace Arsenic: Weird placebo effect with unknown origin. Come on, we are no scientist! Oh wait.
Bubon: Congrats, you now have the bubonic plague. Half of Europe made it through, why not you?
Elzanol: Have you tried breathing snow?
Von Drekenov: Makes your blood pressure not great, and your are weak. But, because you love chicori and ham, you will be quite fine.
Darth Father: No breath, no limp, no stomack. But, in the end, your heart is nice and you will be forgiven.
Rotten 4: It's not good but it works. Kind of.
Sorokdva: The answer to many things, but in a language unknown to intelligent life forms.
Dumpstomania: From dump it came, to dump it will return.
Chemistry: Feels like Mathematics to you.
Makes you breathe as fast as a potatoe. And they breath surprisingly fast!
Alcoethanol: Simulate a brain after the ludum dare.
Margytyrel: This pills will leave you breathless.
Luv: Quite good for your heart. Really.
Love: Your stress and your heartbeat fasten.
Smurf: You muscles become smaller. Much smaller.
Superbrawl: Decrease your muscular mass.
